name: Together - Team Cahoots
description:
Together is a collaborative game where two friends use their unique skills to get back home.  The Green friend can dash across gaps and danger, while the pink friend can spring into action and reach new heights. 

We created this game to show when people work together we can accomplish amazing things .

Team Members:
